Name: The Fool
Effect: Spawns the last Tarot or Planet card used during this run. Excludes The Fool

Name: The Magician
Effect: Enhances 1 selected card into a Lucky Card

Name: The High Priestess
Effect: Spawns up to 2 random Planet cards. Must have room

Name: The Empress
Effect: Enhances up to 2 selected cards to Mult Cards

Name: The Emperor
Effect: Creates up to 2 random Tarot cards. Must have room

Name: The Hierophant
Effect: Enhances up to 2 selected cards to Bonus Cards

Name: The Lovers
Effect: Enhances 1 selected card into a Wild Card

Name: The Chariot
Effect: Enhances 1 selected card into a Steel Card

Name: Justice
Effect: Enhances 1 selected cardinto a Glass Card

Name: The Hermit
Effect: Doubles money. Max of $20.

Name: The Wheel of Fortune
Effect: 1 in 4 chance to add Foil, Holographic, or Polychrome edition to a random Joker

Name: Strength
Effect: Increases rank of up to 2 selected cards by 1

Name: The Hanged Man
Effect: Destroys up to 2 selected cards

Name: Death
Effect: Select 2 cards, convert the left card into the right card.

Name: Temperance
Effect: Gives the total sell value of all current Jokers. Max of $50.

Name: The Devil
Effect: Enhances 1 selected card into a Gold Card

Name: The Tower
Effect: Enhances 1 selected card into a Stone Card

Name: The Star
Effect: Converts up to 3 selected cards to ♦️

Name: The Moon
Effect: Converts up to 3 selected cards to ♣️

Name: The Sun
Effect: Converts up to 3 selected cards to ♥️

Name: Judgement
Effect: Spawns a random Joker card. Must have room

Name: The World
Effect: Converts up to 3 selected cards to ♠️
